body:
Hi Ikrima,


Tutorial series from Dr.Axel Jacobs will be quite helpful to you:


http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/documentation/index.shtml


For 3D modeling you can use tools such as: Ecotect, SketchUp (with Daysim,
OpenStudio).


Hope this helps.


Vaibhav Jain
